skyStriker:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
skyStriker:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

skyStriker:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
skyStriker:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
skyStriker:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

skyStriker:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
skyStriker:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

skyStriker:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
skyStriker:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !skyStriker:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

skyStriker:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
skyStriker:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !skyStriker:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

skyStriker:WidowAnchor.NAME: Widow Anchor
skyStriker:WidowAnchor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy NL lose !M! Strength for 1 turn。 NL Apply !M! [#ffff00]Weak[]。

skyStriker:Engage.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 "Sky Striker" Card from deck.It costs 0 this turn.
skyStriker:Engage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add 1 "Sky Striker" Card from deck.It costs 0 this turn. NL Draw 1
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No "Sky Striker" card in your deck

skyStriker:HerculesBase.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Attack is played twice
skyStriker:HerculesBase.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Attack is played twice. NL Draw 1

skyStriker:ScissorsCross.NAME: ScissorsCross
skyStriker:ScissorsCross.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to random enemies twice

skyStriker:SharkCannon.NAME: SharkCannon
skyStriker:SharkCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice

skyStriker:Kaina.NAME: Kaina
skyStriker:Kaina.DESCRIPTION: Enemy cannot attack until the end of turn. NL Enter [#adad76]Kaina

skyStriker:Kagari.NAME: Kagari
skyStriker:Kagari.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 "Sky Striker" Spell from  discardPile. NL Enter [#c74832]Kagari

skyStriker:Shizuku.NAME: Shizuku
skyStriker:Shizuku.DESCRIPTION: Add 1 "Sky Striker" Spell from deck at the end of this turn. NL Enter [#32b8c7]Shizuku

skyStriker:MultiRole.NAME: MultiRole
skyStriker:MultiRole.DESCRIPTION: Add "Sky Striker" Spells from your Discard Pile, up to the number of "Sky Striker" Spell Cards you activated this turn.They [#ffff00]Exhaust[]

skyStriker:AreaZero.NAME: AreaZero
skyStriker:AreaZero.DESCRIPTION: After Draw Phase,Discard 1, excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck add 1 excavated "Sky Striker" card to your hand

skyStriker:ChickenGame.NAME: ChickenGame
skyStriker:ChickenGame.DESCRIPTION: Every turn you lose 3 HP and draw 1 card
skyStriker:ChickenGame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every turn you lose 3 HP and draw 1.Draw 1
